author: Chiara Giordano, Chiara Giordano
title: 'This is not a rehearsal': NHS coronavirus staff make video plea for people to stay at home
description: 'We are now at a crucial time...you will only have one chance at this'
content:
Medics on the frontline of the coronavirus outbreak have pleaded for people to stay at home in a powerful video that has gone viral.  
Doctors, nurses and physiotherapists fighting the disease in Northern Ireland warned this is not a rehearsal in the recordi… [+2026 chars]
